title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Joy Taylor steps in to discuss the report Aaron Rodgers is seeking as much as $50 million per season from the Packers and what this would mean for his future with the Packers. She casts doubt on the rumors about the 49ers trying to drive up the price for Jimmy Garoppolo when the league knows what he has to offer at this point. She also believes the Lakers are suffering from high expectations more than anything as the second half of the season is underway. Plus, Jimmy Butler from the Heat joins the show to explain why they are ready to contend for a championship once again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
With Colin out, Joy Taylor steps in to discuss the report Aaron Rodgers is seeking as much as $50 million per season from the Packers and what this would mean for his future with the Packers. She casts doubt on the rumors about the 49ers trying to drive up the price for Jimmy Garoppolo when the league knows what he has to offer at this point. She also believes the Lakers are suffering from high expectations more than anything as the second half of the season is underway. Plus, Jimmy Butler from the Heat joins the show to explain why they are ready to contend for a championship once again.
